meanings.definition: The process of transferring blood from one part of the body to another part of the same body.
meanings.sent1: During the autotransfusions, blood is moved within the body.
meanings.sent2: She underwent autotransfusions to move blood from one area to another.
meanings.sent3: The autotransfusions made it seem like her body was playing a blood-swapping game.
meanings.sent4: His body's autotransfusions were like a secret blood delivery service.
meanings.sent5: The autotransfusions painted a picture of blood traveling through his body like a tiny river.
